show.title: The Ultimate Family Business Survival Guide
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/8xCstL
show.description: Oru nattudaiya valarchi la kudumba thozhil romba mukkiyam nu solra Priyanka Gupta Zielinski thannoda Kudumba thozhil la vetrikaramana muraila senju atha pala madangu laabam sambaathikkum onnaa maathirukkaanga. Avangaloda thozhil vazhkai & Kudumba vazhkaila avanga kathukitta practical business lessons sa intha "The Ultimate Family Business Survival Guide" audiobook la sollirukanga. Vaanga thozhil ragasiyangal la kathukalaam.
show.description_secondary: Oru nattudaiya valarchi la kudumba thozhil romba mukkiyam nu solra Priyanka Gupta Zielinski thannoda Kudumba thozhil la vetrikaramana muraila senju atha pala madangu laabam sambaathikkum onnaa maathirukkaanga. Avangaloda thozhil vazhkai & Kudumba vazhkaila avanga kathukitta practical business lessons sa intha "The Ultimate Family Business Survival Guide" audiobook la sollirukanga. Vaanga thozhil ragasiyangal la kathukalaam.

episodes.title: 6. Kudumba Thozhilgalai Yen Meettu Edukka Vendum ?
